headline: Ryan, Shapiro announce drug treatment program expansion in Chester County
author: Michael P. Rellahan

WEST GOSHEN — State and Chester County law enforcement officials gathered Wednesday to announce the broadening of an effort that allows those suffering from drug and alcohol abuse to avoid prosecution for minor crimes if they enroll in treatment programs to help them overcome their addiction.
